name: rachoon
description: Rachoon is a self-hosted financial planning tool that helps manage budgets, track expenses, and visualize monthly cash flows through a user-friendly web interface.

features.title: Budget Planning
features.description: Create monthly budgets by category to track spending limits and financial goals

features.title: Expense Tracking
features.description: Record and categorize transactions to understand where your money goes each month

features.title: Cash Flow Visualization
features.description: View income and expenses over time with charts and graphs for trend analysis

features.title: Recurring Transactions
features.description: Set up automatic entries for regular bills and income to simplify monthly planning

features.title: Category Management
features.description: Organize expenses into custom categories that match your spending patterns

features.title: Multi
features.description: Track finances in different currencies for international accounts and travel expenses

features.title: Goal Setting
features.description: Define savings targets and monitor progress toward financial milestones

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export financial summaries and detailed transaction lists for tax preparation or analysis
